caption:
The photograph captures a young man sitting at a workbench outside, surrounded by industrial elements. The man has shoulder-length wavy blond hair and wears a light gray work shirt with a name tag labeled "Mark." He is dressed in dark green pants and seems to have a somewhat serious or contemplative expression.

On the workbench in front of him, there are piles of various disassembled electronic components and scrap parts, possibly from vehicles or machinery. The background features a large open bay of an industrial building with a vintage car parked inside, and another darker facility can be seen in the distance. Clear skies with a few clouds and some visible industrial smoke or steam contribute to the sceneâ€™s industrial ambiance.

Overall, the image has a vintage feel, reflective of an earlier era's work environment, focusing on manual labor and materials repurposing or recycling. The setting hints at a sort of recycling plant or a similar industrial operation.
title: An employee of the Logan-long recycling plant in franklin demonstrates recyclable products from the community's solid wastes.  (from the sites exhibition.  For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 127, 128, 129, 130, 131.)
